name: Mystic
description: Wielders of arcane power, Mystic path characters harness magical energies to devastating effect.

features.name: Arcane Initiate
features.description: You gain a Spellcrafting Book, an arcane focus, and basic training in shaping magical energy.

features.name: Spell Attunement
features.description: Your Spell Attack modifier equals your Intellect modifier. Your Spell Save TN equals 8 + your Intellect modifier.

features.name: Flow of Thought
features.description: Once per short rest, as a Bonus Action, you gain advantage on Intellect saving throws until the start of your next turn.
